pages.title: Induction Smelter
pages.text: The Induction Smelter is a machine that smelts multiple items together, producing alloys. It can also smelt ores into ingots and gems, which is affected by $(l:thermal:items_and_xfer/materials/catalysts)catalysts$(/l). Smelting ores has a chance to produce Rich Slag. Smelting Gravel yields Flint and Slag.
